trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for all workflow message filters.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller en basklass för alla arbetsflödet meddelandet filter.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The workflow designer provides a `Strategy` design pattern to create replaceable message filter objects to handle events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Arbetsflödesdesignern ger en `Strategy` designmönstret för att skapa utbytbara meddelandet filtreringsobjekt om du vill hantera händelser.

trans-unit.source: Derive from the WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter class to create message filters that can respond to workflow designer events, such as drag operations, layout and paint operations, and other designer events.
trans-unit.target: Härleds från klassen WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter om du vill skapa meddelande filter som kan svara på workflow designer händelser, t.ex dra operations, layout och paint åtgärder och andra designer händelser.

trans-unit.source: To add a custom message filter to the message filters chain, call the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A> on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> or override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A> virtual property on the custom root activity and add the custom message filter to the collection returned from the base class.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill lägga till ett anpassat meddelande-filter i meddelandet filter kedjan anropa <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>på <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>eller åsidosätta de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A>virtuella egenskaper på anpassat rot aktivitet och lägga till anpassade meddelandefiltret till samlingen returnerades från grundläggande klassen.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.IWorkflowRootDesigner.MessageFilters%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Implementeras i en härledd klass initierar en instans av en <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Släpper de ohanterade resurser som används av den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref> och släpper du de hantera resurserna.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden anropas av allmänheten `Dispose()` metod och <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>metod.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`anropar den skyddade `Dispose(Boolean)` metod med den `disposing` parametern `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>anropar `Dispose` med avyttring inställd på `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> references.
trans-unit.target: När den `disposing` parametern är `true`, den här metoden Frigör alla resurser som innehas av alla hanterade objekt som den här <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>referenser.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden startar den `Dispose()` metod för varje refererade till objekt.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > `Dispose` can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > `Dispose` kan anropas flera gånger av andra objekt.

trans-unit.source: When overriding `Dispose(Boolean)`, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to `Dispose`.
trans-unit.target: När du åsidosätter `Dispose(Boolean)`inte, att referera till objekt som tidigare har tagits bort av i ett tidigare anrop till `Dispose`.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] how to implement `Dispose(Boolean)`, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]hur du implementerar `Dispose(Boolean)`, se [implementera en metod för ta bort](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]`Dispose` och `Finalize`, se [Rensa ohanterade resurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) och [åsidosätter metoden Slutför](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frisläpp både hanterade och ohanterade resurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att släppa endast resurser som inte hanteras.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to free resources by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose(false)" name="Dispose(false)" href=""></xref> before the object is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Försök att frigöra de resurser genom att anropa <xref uid="langword_csharp_Dispose(false)" name="Dispose(false)" href=""> </xref> innan objektet har frigjorts av skräpinsamling.

trans-unit.source: This method cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`.
trans-unit.target: Den här metoden rensar resurser genom att anropa `Dispose(false)`.

trans-unit.source: Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup.
trans-unit.target: Åsidosätt `Dispose(Boolean)` att anpassa rensningen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref> with the associated <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initierar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref> med den associerade <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: You can associate message filters with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> to capture messages that occur from user interaction, such as mouse events, keyboard events, paint and layout events.
trans-unit.target: Du kan associera meddelandet filter med det <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>att samla in meddelanden som sker från användarinteraktion, till exempel musen händelser, tangentbordshändelser, paint och layout händelser.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> ska associeras med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that describes the context of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> som beskriver kontexten för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo> contains information about the area and the context of the area hit, including any designers hit and the area on the designer hit.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>innehåller information om området och kontexten för området träffar, inklusive eventuella designers träffar och området på designer träffar.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> object that contains information about the context of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> objekt som innehåller information om kontexten för den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när musknappen släpps ovanför ett objekt under en dragåtgärd.

trans-unit.source: OnDragDrop occurs when the mouse button is released above an object during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: OnDragDrop inträffar när musknappen släpps ovanför ett objekt under en dragåtgärd.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en dragåtgärd.

trans-unit.source: OnGiveFeedback occurs when a drag operation is started.
trans-unit.target: OnGiveFeedback inträffar när en dra-åtgärden har startats.

trans-unit.source: OnGiveFeedback allows the source of a drag operation to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to give you visual feedback during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: OnGiveFeedback kan källan för en dragåtgärd att ändra utseendet på muspekaren att ge visuell feedback under en dragåtgärd.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en tangent trycks.

trans-unit.source: OnKeyDown occurs when a key is pressed when a specific object has focus.
trans-unit.target: VidTangentNed inträffar när en tangent trycks när ett specifikt objekt har fokus.

trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en tangent släpps.

trans-unit.source: OnKeyUp occurs when a key is released when a specific object has focus.
trans-unit.target: VidTangentUpp inträffar när en tangent släpps när ett specifikt objekt har fokus.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when child objects should be repositioned.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när underordnade objekt ska flyttas.

trans-unit.source: OnLayout occurs when child objects should be repositioned within the parent container.
trans-unit.target: OnLayout inträffar när underordnade objekt som ska flyttas i överordnad behållare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the items selected by dragging the mouse changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när objekt som valts genom att dra musen ändringarna.

trans-unit.source: OnMouseCaptureChanged occurs when the items selected by dragging the mouse changes.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseCaptureChanged inträffar när objekt som valts genom att dra musen ändringarna.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when you double-click the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när du dubbelklickar på med musen.

trans-unit.source: OnMouseDoubleClick occurs when you double-click the mouse.
trans-unit.target: OnMouseDoubleClick inträffar när du dubbelklickar på med musen.

trans-unit.source: The double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Dubbelklicka bestäms av inställningarna i operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: You can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that is considered a double-click rather than two clicks.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ange tiden mellan klick musklickning som anses vara en snarare än två klickar.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet hanteras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a paint message is received.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när ett meddelande paint.

trans-unit.source: OnPaint occurs when a paint message is received.
trans-unit.target: OnPaint inträffar när ett meddelande paint.

trans-unit.source: Use the parameters passed to OnPaint to determine the area to be painted, the theme used, and additional information about the event passed in the `PaintEventArgs`.
trans-unit.target: Använda parametrarna som skickas till OnPaint för att fastställa området som ska återges, det tema som används, och ytterligare information om händelsen skickas i den `PaintEventArgs`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that describes the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som beskriver området som ska återges.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> used to obtain information about the theme.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref> används för att få information om temat.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet hanteras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när arbetsflödet ska uppdatera sin dekorationer.

trans-unit.source: `OnPaintWorkflowAdornments` occurs when the workflow should repaint its adornments.
trans-unit.target: `OnPaintWorkflowAdornments`inträffar när arbetsflödet ska uppdatera sin dekorationer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_PaintEventArgs" name="PaintEventArgs" href=""></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_PaintEventArgs" name="PaintEventArgs" href=""> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rectangle" name="Rectangle" href=""></xref> that describes the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_Rectangle" name="Rectangle" href=""> </xref> som beskriver området som ska återges.

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_AmbientTheme" name="AmbientTheme" href=""></xref> used to obtain information about the theme.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_AmbientTheme" name="AmbientTheme" href=""> </xref> används för att få information om temat.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet hanteras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en dragåtgärd.

trans-unit.source: `OnQueryContinueDrag` occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: `OnQueryContinueDrag`inträffar när en dragåtgärd.

trans-unit.source: The `OnQueryContinueDrag` event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den `OnQueryContinueDrag` händelsen kan dra källan för att avgöra om dra ska avbrytas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> som innehåller information om händelsen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet hanteras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a user scrolls in a workflow designer.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en användare rullar i en arbetsflödesdesigner.

trans-unit.source: OnScroll occurs when you use a scroll bar on a designer to scroll up, down, left, or right.
trans-unit.target: OnScroll inträffar när du använder en rullningslist på en designer rulla upp, ned, vänster, eller till höger.

trans-unit.source: Unless overridden in a derived class, OnScroll always returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Om det inte åsidosätts i härledda klassen OnScroll returnerar alltid `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"></xref> that the user scrolled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar"> </xref> som användaren rullas.

trans-unit.source: The position of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Positionen för rullningslisten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet hanteras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow should show a context menu.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när arbetsflödet ska visa en snabbmeny.

trans-unit.source: OnShowContextMenu occurs when the workflow should show a context menu.
trans-unit.target: OnShowContextMenu inträffar när arbetsflödet ska visa en snabbmeny.

trans-unit.source: The point at which to the context menu is shown.
trans-unit.target: Peka på snabbmenyn som visas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet hanteras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the theme of the workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när temat i arbetsflödet ändras.

trans-unit.source: OnThemeChange occurs when you make changes to the workflow theme.
trans-unit.target: OnThemeChange inträffar när du gör ändringar i arbetsflödet tema.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> som är associerad med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A message filter responds to events in a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.
trans-unit.target: En meddelandefilter reagerar på händelser i <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The message filter is associated with a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Meddelandefiltret är associerad med ett <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>med hjälp av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.AddDesignerMessageFilter%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: When an event occurs in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> it passes the message on to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: När en händelse inträffar i den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>den skickar meddelandet till den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>som ska hanteras.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref> som är associerade med den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a raw Win32 message must be processed.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när ett raw Win32-meddelande måste bearbetas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView> can receive raw Win32 messages from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>kan ta emot rådata Win32-meddelanden från operativsystemet.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView>

trans-unit.source: Messages forward to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter> to be handled.
trans-unit.target: Att vidarebefordra meddelanden till den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>som ska hanteras.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerMessageFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Message" name="Message" href=""></xref> to handle.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Message" name="Message" href=""> </xref> ska hanteras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message is handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om meddelandet hanteras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
